Depressing stat:

Andrei Vasilevskiy led the NHL in Goals Saved Above Expected in last years playoffs, with 26.6 GSAx in 23 GP. More than a goal per game.

The 2nd best goalie was Carey Price, with 12.3 GSAx in 22 GP.

If we thought Playoff Price was scary, Vasy is horrifying.

Andrei Vasilevskiy is definitely back, he has looked like the Big Cat of old! #GoBolts

There's the horn and that's it for this one, a 6-4 win for Tampa Bay. Andrei Vasilevskiy finishes tied for first in the NHL with 39 wins on the year. Great comeback win for the #Bolts, who will look to use that positive momentum as they head into the postseason.
#TBLvsNYI

Leafs v Tampa on Monday 

Buckle up..

Obviously the x-factor is andrei vasilevskiy.

Heavy pressure from the Islanders and Andrei Vasilevskiy does a good job to make a blocker save and direct the puck over the glass for a whistle. Still 1-1 as we near the halfway point of the second period.
#TBLvsNYI

Really athletic play by Andrei Vasilevskiy early in the second period to track a puck that was way up in the air and blocker it away out of trouble.
#TBLvsNYI

Big save by Andrei Vasilevskiy on Kyle Palmieri, who got behind the #Bolts defense and in all alone on a breakaway.
